section.title: About
section.p: Are you looking for the best American restaurant in Blacksburg? Look no further than G2's All American Grill. This eatery serves up some of the most delicious American cuisine around. Our commitment is to provide you with the best American cuisine options to satisfy your hunger and to provide you with a variety of options to ensure you have the best culinary experience.

section.title: Menu
section.p: G2's offers fries either as a Basket of Fries for $4.99, Cheese Fries for $5.99, or Basket of Sweet Potato Fries for $5.88.G2's MenuG2's menu showing basket of fries.

section.title: Texture
section.p: These fries have a decent balance of a crispy exterior and a fluffy interior. They are a thicker cut than most other fries on this list which makes them lean towards fluffy.

section.title: Flavor
section.p: These fries have a special fry seasoning that gives it an elevated flavor.

section.title: Dipping Sauce
section.p: G2's offers basic dipping sauce options: ketchup and mustard.

section.title: Cost Value Analysis
section.p: $5 for a basket is a great deal!

section.title: Variability Rate
section.p: Keep in mind that I had have fewer visits to this restaurant so the variability rate may be as accurate as what this guide suggests.

section.title: Overall
section.p: G2's has some of the best American food in Blacksburg, Virginia and these fries are no exception. A classic burger and fries combo is necessary when visiting town!G2's FriesPlate with burger and fries.
